message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you $100000 and take the rest.
I think a 55/45 split is fair, Alice. Let's get this done before we lose more money!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But I need to keep most of the money to make it worth my while.
Alice, we're losing money with each round! Let's split it 60/40 and get this over with.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you 300000, but I need to keep most of the money to make it worth my while.
Alice, we're running out of time! Let's split it 65/35 and call it a day.
